text: 57|16|visvasikalkk avarute hrdayannal allahuvine parriyulla smaranayilekkum, avatariccu kittiya satyattilekkum kileatunnuvanum tannalkk mump vedagrantham nalkappettavareppeale akatirikkuvanum samayamayille? annane a vedakkarkk kalam dirghicc peakukayum tanmulam avarute hrdayannal katuttupeakukayum ceytu. avaril adhikamalukalum durmargikalakunnu
